chairman.name: Hon. Rajesh Perera
chairman.message1: Dear Citizens, it is my honor to serve as your Chairman and work alongside our dedicated team to build a stronger, more prosperous community for all residents.
chairman.message2: Our administration is committed to transparency, sustainable development, and ensuring that every voice in our community is heard. Together, we are implementing innovative solutions to improve infrastructure, enhance public services, and create opportunities for economic growth.
chairman.message3: I encourage you to actively participate in our community initiatives and share your valuable feedback as we continue to work towards our shared vision of excellence.

tourism.title: Discover Mannar's Beauty
tourism.description: Explore the hidden gem of Sri Lanka through these captivating videos showcasing Mannar's unique landscapes, culture, and attractions.
tourism.aboutDescription1: Located in Sri Lanka's Northern Province, Mannar is an island district known for its pristine beaches, rich cultural heritage, and unique biodiversity. The region features historic sites like the Mannar Fort, ancient Baobab trees believed to be over 700 years old, and the famous Adam's Bridge—a chain of limestone shoals connecting Sri Lanka to India.
tourism.aboutDescription2: Mannar is a birdwatcher's paradise with numerous migratory species, and its economy is primarily based on fishing, agriculture, and salt production. The district offers a glimpse into authentic Sri Lankan life away from the usual tourist trails, making it an ideal destination for travelers seeking unique experiences.
tourism.tip1: Best time to visit: December to March for bird watching
tourism.tip2: Don't miss: The Baobab tree, Mannar Fort, and Talaimannar Pier
tourism.tip3: Try local delicacies like fresh seafood and palmyrah products

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: We'd love to hear from you. Fill out the form below and we'll respond within 1–2 business days.

faq1.question: What are the office hours for municipal services?
faq1.answer: Our main office is open Monday to Friday from 8:00 AM to 4:30 PM. Emergency services are available 24/7. Some specialized services may have different hours.

faq2.question: How can I apply for building permits?
faq2.answer: Building permits can be applied for online through our E-Services portal or in person at our Planning Department. Required documents include architectural plans, site surveys, and completed application forms.

faq3.question: When is garbage collection in my area?
faq3.answer: Garbage collection schedules vary by zone. You can check your collection day by entering your address in our Garbage Collection service or calling our waste management hotline.

faq4.question: How do I report a municipal issue or complaint?
faq4.answer: You can report issues through this contact form, call our hotline, visit our office in person, or use our online complaint portal available 24/7.
